meanings.definition: A byproduct or incidental result of a larger project or event.
meanings.sent1: The spinoffs of the science fair project were unexpected but exciting.
meanings.sent2: The spinoffs of the construction project included new job opportunities for the community.
meanings.sent3: The spinoffs of the bake sale were so popular that they ran out of cookies!
meanings.sent4: The spinoffs of the brainstorming session led to innovative solutions for the company.
meanings.sent5: The spinoffs of the art class were colorful and creative, surprising everyone.

meanings.definition: A new company or product that is created as a result of a larger organization or project.
meanings.sent1: The tech giant's spinoffs have revolutionized the industry.
meanings.sent2: The spinoffs of the startup have quickly gained market share.
meanings.sent3: The spinoffs of the fashion brand are trendy and stylish.
meanings.sent4: The spinoffs of the movie franchise have become box office hits.
meanings.sent5: The spinoffs of the restaurant chain offer unique dining experiences.
